CustomField.description: Main email for grantee to which this grants is given. Copied by automation from the parent Account/Org record. In turn copied down to grantee report and payment records. Included in report reminders and payment notifications.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Main email for grantee to which this grants is given. Copied by automation from the parent Account/Org record. In turn copied down to grantee report and payment records. Included in report reminders and payment notifications.
CustomField.label: Grantee Org Main Email
